  • Package peer

    • Class peer.ByteSlice extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • bytes

          byte[] bytes

        • bytes_written

          int bytes_written

    • Class peer.Content extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • file_data

          byte[] file_data
          The bytes of the file, only used when sending the file to a Peer

        • file_description

          java.util.List<java.lang.String> file_description
          The descriptions the file has, in the same host or on another

        • file_name

          java.util.List<java.lang.String> file_name
          The filenames the file has, in the same host or on another

        • hash

          java.lang.String hash
          The CRC32 hash of the file

        • local_route

          java.lang.String local_route
          Route where the file is, including subdirectories

        • tags

          java.util.List<java.lang.String> tags
          The tags the file has, in the same host or on another

    • Class peer.ContentManager extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cache

          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​ByteSlice[]> cache
          Cache hashmap to store likely-to-be-downloaded files

        • contents

          java.util.List<Content> contents
          List of all Contents, without file_data

        • folder_route

          java.lang.String folder_route
          The route where we take files from and where we will save the ones we download

        • logger

          java.util.logging.Logger logger
          Logger used to print INFO, WARNINGS and SEVERES

        • slice_size

          int slice_size
          The size of a slice that will be sent over the network, 1 MB (in bytes)

        • upload_semaphore

          java.util.concurrent.Semaphore upload_semaphore
          Semaphore to control uploading concurrency

    • Class peer.PeerImp extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • download_queue_thread

          PeerImp.GlobalQueueThread download_queue_thread
          Thread that will run all the time, managing a queue of download threads

        • file_queue_thread

          PeerImp.GlobalQueueThread file_queue_thread
          Thread that will run all the time, managing a queue of file threads

        • manager

          ContentManager manager
          The Manager of this peer

        • own_info

          PeerInfo own_info
          The PeerInfo of this peer

        • registry

          java.rmi.registry.Registry registry
          The Registry of this peer

        • saved_managers

          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Manager> saved_managers
          HashMap where Manager references are stored using their PeerInfo.toString();

        • saved_peers

          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Peer> saved_peers
          HashMap where Peer references are stored using their PeerInfo.toString();

        • saved_peers_info

          java.util.List<PeerInfo> saved_peers_info
          List of all the peers that the program has the Peers and Managers referenced
